== Alorna (626649) ==

Alorna is a village in the [[Pernem]] taluka of [[North Goa]] district with an area of 2185.54 hectares and harbouring 600 households with total population of 2651 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[PERNEM]] is at a distance of 25 km. Male population is 1351 and female population is 1300. Scheduled Caste Population is 156 and Scheduled Tribes population is 4. Census Location Code of the village is 626649<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
